aboutSingkat.title: About WSMU
aboutSingkat.descriptionMobile: PT. Wang Sarimulti Utama provides the best manufacturing solutions, from manufacturing tooling, plastic injection, to secondary process services such as painting, printing, laser marking, hot stamping, and sub-assembly.
aboutSingkat.descriptionDesktop: PT. Wang Sarimulti Utama provides the best manufacturing solutions, from manufacturing tooling, plastic injection, to secondary process services such as painting, printing, laser marking, hot stamping, and sub-assembly. With more than 25 years of experience in the plastic industry, we produce creative designs and high-quality products.

ourAdvantages.qualityDesc: We are committed to providing the highest quality products.
ourAdvantages.teamDesc: Professional team with years of industry expertise.
ourAdvantages.innovationDesc: Continuous innovation to meet industry demands.

servicesSingkat.descMobile: Our services span across end-to-end manufacturing solutions, including Manufacturing Tooling, Plastic Injection, and Secondary Processes.
servicesSingkat.descDesktop: Our services span across end-to-end manufacturing solutions, including Manufacturing Tooling, Plastic Injection Manufacturing, and a full range of Secondary Processes such as Painting, Printing, Laser Marking, Hotstamp, and Sub-Assembling.
servicesSingkat.cardDesc: With cutting-edge technology and a skilled team, we create high-quality molds and tooling that are essential for efficient and precise manufacturing.

products.heroDescription: Advanced industrial components engineered for reliability, durability, and exceptional performance across diverse applications.
products.ourProductsDesc: Comprehensive range of precision-engineered components designed to meet the highest industry standards.
